36_18.sketch: A long-abandoned orchard row still clings to life. Faint paths between trees remain.

37_18.sketch: Animal tracks lead through a muddy bend beneath willows.

43_18.sketch: Through the swirling fog, a high ridge looms. Something ancient waits unseen.

44_18.sketch: The wind moans through bent pine limbs. A crow’s call echoes sharply.

45_18.sketch: From the ridge, the whole valley sprawls below — half mist, half memory.
